Parameter.Title: Basic Set Level
Parameter.Description: This parameter determines the level of humidity at which the basic set value will be ON. 0 = Disabled

Parameter.Title: Temperature Trigger-ON Value
Parameter.Description: This parameter determines the temperature in C which will trigger a temperature ON report. 20-50 = Temperature C 99 = Clear Temperature trigger-ON value

Parameter.Title: Temperature Trigger-OFF Value
Parameter.Description: This parameter determines the temperature in C which will trigger a temperature OFF report. 20-50 = Temperature C 99 = Clear Temperature trigger-OFF value

Parameter.Title: Humidity Trigger-ON Value
Parameter.Description: This parameter determines the percentage humidity which will trigger a humidity ON report. 20-90 = Humidity % 99 = Clear Humidity trigger-ON value

Parameter.Title: Humidity Trigger-OFF Value
Parameter.Description: This parameter determines the percentage humidity which will trigger a humidity OFF report. 20-90 = Humidity % 99 = Clear Humidity trigger-OFF value

Parameter.Title: Auto Report (Time Interval)
Parameter.Description: This parameter determines the time based auto reporting interval in minutes. 1-1439 = The auto report time interval in minutes 0 = Disable time based auto report

Parameter.Title: Auto Report (Temperature Change)
Parameter.Description:
This parameter determines the temperature change in C that will trigger a reporting. 1-70 = The auto report termperature change in C 0 = Disable temperature auto report
*** Note FW1.6 does not correctly power up to detect this setting. Fixed by FW1.8. Upon battery replacement you must adjust this setting to get setting to work

Parameter.Title: Auto Report (Humidity Change)
Parameter.Description:
This parameter determines the humidity change in % that will trigger a reporting. 5-70 = The auto report humidity change in % 0 = Disable humidity auto report
*** Note FW1.6 does not correctly power up to detect this setting. Fixed by FW1.8. Upon battery replacement you must adjust this setting to get setting to work
